001package net.tvburger.jdl.datasets;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.NumberTypeAgnostic;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.UnaryEstimationFunction;
007
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Random;
011
012public final class SyntheticDataSets {
013
014    public static abstract class SyntheticDataSet<N extends Number> implements NumberTypeAgnostic<N> {
015
016        private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
017        private final Random random = new Random();
018        private float noiseScale = 0.1f;
019        private float bias = 0.0f;
020
021        protected SyntheticDataSet(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
022            this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
023        }
024
025        @Override
026        public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getCurrentNumberType() {
027            return typeSupport;
028        }
029
030        public void setNoiseScale(float noiseScale) {
031            this.noiseScale = noiseScale;
032        }
033
034        public float getNoiseScale() {
035            return noiseScale;
036        }
037
038        public float getBias() {
039            return bias;
040        }
041
042        public void setBias(float bias) {
043            this.bias = bias;
044        }
045
046        public void setRandomSeed(int seed) {
047            random.setSeed(seed);
048        }
049
050        public DataSet<N> loadRandomX(float min, float max, int n) {
051            List<DataSet.Sample<N>> samples = new ArrayList<>();
052            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
053                float x = (max - min) * random.nextFloat() + min;
054                float y = targetOutputs(x) + noiseScale * (float) random.nextGaussian(0.0, noiseScale) + bias;
055                N[] xa = typeSupport.createArray(1);
056                xa[0] = typeSupport.valueOf(x);
057                N[] ya = typeSupport.createArray(1);
058                ya[0] = typeSupport.valueOf(y);
059                samples.add(new DataSet.Sample<>(xa, ya));
060            }
061            return new DataSet<>(samples);
062        }
063
064        public DataSet<N> loadEvenX(float min, float max, int n) {
065            List<DataSet.Sample<N>> samples = new ArrayList<>();
066            N range = typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.valueOf(max), typeSupport.valueOf(min));
067            N counter = typeSupport.zero();
068            N n_min_1 = typeSupport.valueOf(n - 1);
069            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
070                N x = typeSupport.add(typeSupport.multiply(typeSupport.divide(range, n_min_1), counter), typeSupport.valueOf(min));
071                N y = typeSupport.valueOf(targetOutputs(x.floatValue()) + noiseScale * (float) random.nextGaussian(0.0, noiseScale));
072                N[] xa = typeSupport.createArray(1);
073                xa[0] = x;
074                N[] ya = typeSupport.createArray(1);
075                ya[0] = y;
076                samples.add(new DataSet.Sample<>(xa, ya));
077                counter = typeSupport.add(counter, typeSupport.one());
078            }
079            return new DataSet<>(samples);
080        }
081
082        public DataSet<N> load(int n, float min, float max) {
083            return loadEvenX(min, max, n);
084        }
085
086        public DataSet<N> load(int n) {
087            return loadEvenX(0.0f, 1.0f, n);
088        }
089
090        public DataSet<N> load() {
091            return loadEvenX(0.0f, 1.0f, 1000);
092        }
093
094        protected abstract float targetOutputs(float x);
095
096        public UnaryEstimationFunction<N> getEstimationFunction() {
097            return new UnaryEstimationFunction<>() {
098                @Override
099                public N estimateUnary(N input) {
100                    return typeSupport.valueOf(targetOutputs(input.floatValue()));
101                }
102
103                @Override
104                public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getCurrentNumberType() {
105                    return typeSupport;
106                }
107            };
108        }
109    }
110
111    public static <N extends Number> SyntheticDataSet<N> line(float bias, float weight, JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
112        return new SyntheticDataSet<>(typeSupport) {
113            @Override
114            public float targetOutputs(float x) {
115                return weight * x + bias;
116            }
117        };
118    }
119
120    public static <N extends Number> SyntheticDataSet<N> sinus(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
121        return sinus(1.0f, (float) Math.PI * 2, typeSupport);
122    }
123
124    public static <N extends Number> SyntheticDataSet<N> sinus(float scale, float period, JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
125        return new SyntheticDataSet<>(typeSupport) {
126            @Override
127            public float targetOutputs(float x) {
128                return scale * (float) Math.sin(x * period);
129            }
130        };
131    }
132
133}
